jobDescription: ABOUT YOU: Youre awesome. You make an impression wherever you go. You dont want to work at just any restaurant, you want to work with a restaurant that will develop you, nourish and inspire you, and provide a fun atmosphere that will make it fun to go to work every day. ABOUT US: We care about people, are passionate about our food, take pride in what we do and love life! Come join our amazing team, make new friends, develop your career and have fun. RESPONSIBILITIES:
